weapon.fists.name: Fists
weapon.fists.description: Just you, your fists and the world.

weapon.claws.name: Claws
weapon.claws.description: Razor sharp claws that can tear the skin off of an opponent.

weapon.broken_slime_shooter.name: Broken Slime Shooter
weapon.broken_slime_shooter.description: Slimes attack their enemies by shooting out a small ball of slime at their targets. They may hurt themselves in the process.

weapon.slime_shooter.name: Slime Shooter
weapon.slime_shooter.description: Slimes attack their enemies by shooting out a small ball of slime at their targets. They may hurt themselves in the process.

weapon.dagger.name: Dagger
weapon.dagger.description: A small iron dagger. Not very effective but better than your fists.

weapon.bow.name: Bow
weapon.bow.description: Long ranged weapon. Hard to aim however. Without much skill a bowman will miss many shots.

weapon.sword.name: Sword
weapon.sword.description: A typical iron sword with a bronze hilt.

weapon.long_bow.name: Long Bow
weapon.long_bow.description: Long ranged weapon. Hard to aim however. Without much skill a bowman will miss many shots.

weapon.axe.name: Axe
weapon.axe.description: A two-handed axe that needs lots of force to yield.

weapon.nunchucks.name: Nunchucks
weapon.nunchucks.description: Swing em around and hit your enemies hard!

weapon.katana.name: Katana
weapon.katana.description: A blade for a seasoned Samurai, sharp as glass. Cuts deep into your enemies with only the slightest movements.

weapon.long_axe.name: Long Axe
weapon.long_axe.description: A two-handed axe that needs lots of force to yield.

weapon.daedric_sword.name: Daedric Sword
weapon.daedric_sword.description: This legendary blade is made from volcanic magma that has been infused with magical dragon bone. Whoever wields this blade can kill their opponents very quickly.

weapon.mjolnir.name: Mjolnir
weapon.mjolnir.description: The legendary hammer of the Norse god of thunder Thor.

weapon.excalibur.name: Excalibur
weapon.excalibur.description: The legendary sword in the stone.

weapon.dragon_fire.name: Dragon Fire
weapon.dragon_fire.description: Fire that, using the magical power of dragons, can turn anything to dust.
